sentences: The international political response to climate change took shape with the adoption of the UNFCCC, which entered into force in 1994.

The UNFCCC sets out a framework for action aimed at stabilizing atmospheric GHG concentrations at a level that would prevent human-induced actions from leading to 'dangerous interference' with the climate system.
Under the UNFCCC, all Parties are required to provide regular reports on the steps they are taking to implement the UNFCCC.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) workshop on the preparation of national communications from non-Annex I Parties
